name: Guac-A-Mole (shynx)
description:
Guac-A-Mole

Guac-A-Mole is a twist on the 1976 arcade game "Whack-A-Mole" where moles pop up out of holes in the machine and the player must hit them in the head with a hammer. Now, that's just animal cruelty, so instead of abusing the poor subterranean fellas, feed them some avocado-based salad!

Don't whack the moles! Feed them instead.
